articles.content: The legendary Kapil Dev has lauded the great Sachin Tendulkar, calling the Indian batting legend the perfect example of talent and hard-work. Having started at the tender age of 16, Tendulkar went on… [+1839 chars]

articles.title: Porsche, Audi will join Formula One, Volkswagen CEO says - ESPN India
articles.description: Volkswagen's premium brands Audi and Porsche will join Formula One, VW chief executive Herbert Diess said on Monday.
